artist: Ulrica Hydman-Vallien; Manufactured by Kosta Boda, Sweden
description: body painted semi-opaque white with black drawn outlines of two facing faces; snake and lizard-like creature
marks: \"Kosta Boda since 1742\", on sticker, below rim; in \"Ulrika HV/LF\", on side right of sticker near top
title: "Caramba" vase
